snippet: Campaigning in New Hampshire, Rick Santorum is displaying the spunk and charm that sustained him in Iowa, but also the lack of polish of a candidate who has had little public scrutiny.
abstract: Campaigning in New Hampshire, Rick Santorum is displaying the spunk and charm that sustained him in Iowa, but also the lack of polish of a candidate who has had little public scrutiny.

headline.main: Spotlight Shines on Santorum, Rough Edges and All
